page.title: 19NATURE RESERVE
page.content: Warden of the Kingley Vale reserve.{ {What does Conservancy mean?} Looking after wild life and stopping actions that damage wild life. {What's the Nature Conservancy Council? For 30 yrs. it has received money from the Government to buy the best pieces of land ,eg.mountain ,coast. It makes sure farmers look after wildlife and controls chemical usage. {What jobs do you do? Putting up fences, counting birds or butterflies, talking to visitors, and looking after the museum. {How long have you been working here? 22 years. {Why did you choose the job? I have always been fascinated by wildlife & used to protect birds, help injured animals, put out fires etc.
